author: radekkapka
content: My argument is that requiring the param pre-Electra makes the endpoint confusing for users

author: radekkapka
content: And developers have to either ignore the param pre-Electra (your way) or check for it's existence post-Electra (my way). Either way there is some overhead for devs, but in my version using the endpoint doesn't add friction.

author: nc1234
content: I think it's a one-time effort to communicate to users regarding v2 endpoint usage pre and post electra. Users who didn't receive this communication can continue to use v1 though not ideal

author: nc1234
content: Or we don't deprecate v1 until a later time

author: nflaig
content: The next release of beacon api will likely be just a few weeks before the fork, having it marked as deprecated in the development version shouldn't be a signal to consumers to use v2 instead as all clients might not even have it implemented yet
